name: The Crowded Party Game Collection
description: Local multiplayer for up to 10 players! Grab your phones, use them as controllers and jump into this collection of fast paced mini games! No need for apps, no need for lobbies or long waiting - the perfect addition for your next party.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel® Celeron® Prozessor N2820 or comparable 2,4 GHz dual-core processor Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Intel® on board graphics DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: some phones for playing, wifi network, Java 8
